snippet: Format and scoring changes at the Donestia-San Sebastian Chess Festival in Spain and the Reggio Emilia event in Italy lead to surprising results.
abstract: Dylan Loeb McClain Chess column on new rules instituted at the Donestia-San Sebastian Chess Festival in Spain and the 54th Reggio Emilia in Italy in order to make the competitions more exciting.
lead_paragraph: Format and scoring changes at the Donestia-San Sebastian Chess Festival in Spain and the Reggio Emilia event in Italy lead to surprising results.

headline.seo: Chess: Donestia Festival and Reggio Emilia Tournament Shake-ups
headline.main: Shaking Things Up by Tweaking the Rules
headline.print_headline: Shaking Things Up By Tweaking the Rules
